title: Does USPS deliver mail directly to people under the protection of the Secret Service?
subtitle: The Secret Service appears to have a policy of screening packages for those who protect them, but this was not evidence of a "false flag" operation.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The allegations made by the media about the bombs mailed to Clinton and Obama were false because the United States Security Agency did not deliver mail to people under the protection of the Secret Service.
